name: Laurel or Yanny
one_liner: An auditory illusion where people hear either the word 'Laurel' or 'Yanny' from the same audio clip.
meaning: Similar to 'The Dress', it highlights how our biology shapes our interpretation of reality.
example_lines: Same sound but different names, Laurel or Yanny?
Frequency glitching, you hearing something I don't
